label: Neutrino Mass Splittings
mathematical_goal: Derive neutrino mass-squared differences from G2 topology via type-I seesaw mechanism
theoretical_significance: Neutrino masses arise from type-I seesaw: m_nu ~ (y_nu v)^2/M_R, where M_R ~ M_GUT/k_gimel ~ 10^15 GeV is the right-handed neutrino mass scale set by G2 moduli. The atmospheric splitting is controlled by b3/chi_eff = 1/6. The solar splitting is suppressed by (b2/b3)^2 ~ 0.34 relative to atmospheric.
